response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its unique features and benefits make it invaluable, with an estimated worth of $12,000 to us. Considering its rarity and the extensive research and development that went into its creation, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to own something truly special. We look forward to hearing your thoughts on this remarkable offering.", "product_price": 11000}
